data.name: War Machine
data.description: An armored soldier who uses an arsenal of weapons to bombard his foes. More powerful in Alliance Wars.

starItems.name: War Machine
starItems.description: An armored soldier who uses an arsenal of weapons to bombard his foes. More powerful in Alliance Wars.

1.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to primary target

3.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to primary target.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> to apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to primary target.
4.nextUpgrade: Always apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to primary target

5.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to primary target.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to primary target.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description: Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to primary target.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.
 
 If Iron Man is an ally, attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing.
 
 If Iron Man is an ally, attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing.
 
 If Iron Man is an ally, attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets <color=#86e619>2-3</color> times for <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing.
 
 If Iron Man is an ally, attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets <color=#86e619>2-3</color> times for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.
 
 If Iron Man is an ally, attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets <color=#86e619>2-3</color> times for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.
 
 If Iron Man is an ally, attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets 
Always attack <color=#86e619>3</color> times

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets <color=#86e619>3</color> times for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing.
 
 If Iron Man is an ally, attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage. 
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>30%</color> per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally.

This attack cannot miss (though it can be dodged).

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage. 
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>30%</color> per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally.

This attack cannot miss (though it can be dodged).

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage. 
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>30%</color> per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally.

This attack cannot miss (though it can be dodged).

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage. 
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>30%</color> per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally.

This attack cannot miss (though it can be dodged).

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage. 
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>30%</color> per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally.

This attack cannot miss (though it can be dodged).

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage. 
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>30%</color> per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally.

This attack cannot miss (though it can be dodged).

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>340%</color> damage. 
Damage is increased by <color=#86e619>30%</color> per <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally.

This attack cannot miss (though it can be dodged).

1.description:
Gain <color=#86e619>+5%</color> Damage. 
If Iron Man is an ally, gain <color=#86e619>+10%</color> Crit Damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to enemies when they drop below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health
 If Iron Man is an ally, Iron Man and War Machine gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>

2.description:
Gain <color=#86e619>+5%</color> Damage. If an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> health, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>. 
If Iron Man is an ally, gain <color=#86e619>+10%</color> Crit Damage, gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, and grant <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to Iron Man.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, War Machine gains <color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage
If Iron Man is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage

3.description:
Gain <color=#86e619>+10%</color> Damage. If an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> health, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>. 

If Iron Man is an ally, gain <color=#86e619>+20%</color> Crit Damage, gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, and grant <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to Iron Man.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, War Machine gains <color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.

4.description:
Gain <color=#86e619>+10%</color> Damage. Gain <color=#86e619>5%</color> Piercing. When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>. 

If Iron Man is an ally, gain <color=#86e619>+20%</color> Crit Damage, gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, and grant <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to Iron Man.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, War Machine gains <color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
4.nextUpgrade:
Always apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to enemies when they drop below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health
If Iron Man is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Damage
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage

5.description:
Gain <color=#86e619>+10%</color> Damage. Gain <color=#86e619>5%</color> Piercing. When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, they gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>. 

If Iron Man is an ally, gain <color=#86e619>30%</color> Crit Damage, gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, and grant <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to Iron Man.

 In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, War Machine gains <color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.
